original: <color=#faffa3ff>《村居》作者草長鶯飛二月天，拂堤楊柳醉春煙。兒童散學歸來早，忙趁東風放紙鳶。</color><color=#ff0000ff>想要執行季內政嗎？</color>
text: <color=#faffa3ff> The author of "Village Residence" Cao Changying flies on a February day, drunk spring smoke on the bank of willows. The children returned early from school, and took advantage of the east wind to release paper kites. </color><color=#ff0000ff>Do you want to carry out the internal affairs of the quarter? </color>
